20101221153147.000|20101221153147.000|CC1|HOURS.                          
20101221153147.000|20101221153150.000|CC1|OUT OF THE WEEK.

20101221153151.000|20101221153152.000|CC1|WOULD REHEARSE A DAY.           
20101221153152.000|20101221153155.000|CC1|SO IT WAS -- IT BECAME THE      
20101221153155.000|20101221153156.000|CC1|CAREER THAT SHE LOVED.

20101221153215.000|20101221153216.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ACCORDING TO POLICE
20101221153216.000|20101221153217.000|CC1|SHE WAS LAST SEEN LEAVING HER

20101221154718.000|20101221154720.000|CC1|YOU SAY KNOW THE GENERIC NAME.  
20101221154720.000|20101221154722.000|CC1|BECAUSE THAT WILL GIVE YOU THE  
20101221154722.000|20101221154722.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY, IF YOU'RE IN A     
20101221154722.000|20101221154723.000|CC1|PLACE THAT DOESN'T HAVE THE     
20101221154723.000|20101221154725.000|CC1|BRAND NAME, YOU CAN TAKE THE    
20101221154725.000|20101221154726.000|CC1|GENERIC.                        
20101221154726.000|20101221154726.000|CC1|>> EXACTLY.                     
20101221154726.000|20101221154728.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY IN FOREIGN COUNTRIES 
20101221154728.000|20101221154729.000|CC1|THEY MIGHT NOT HAVE THE EXACT   
20101221154729.000|20101221154730.000|CC1|MEDICATION BUT SOMETHING VERY   
20101221154730.000|20101221154730.000|CC1|SIMILAR TO IT.                  
20101221154730.000|20101221154732.000|CC1|>> THIS IS A QUESTION I'VE FACED
20101221154732.000|20101221154733.000|CC1|BEFORE, IF YOU ARE SICK, WHETHER
20101221154733.000|20101221154735.000|CC1|OR NOT TO GET ON THAT FLIGHT,   
20101221154735.000|20101221154736.000|CC1|WHETHER OR NOT TO TAKE TO THE   
20101221154736.000|20101221154736.000|CC1|ROAD.                           
20101221154736.000|20101221154737.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU DETERMINE AN ANSWER? 
20101221154737.000|20101221154739.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU KNOW WHAT, THIS IS 
20101221154739.000|20101221154740.000|CC1|REALLY ABOUT THE CONSIDERATION  
20101221154740.000|20101221154741.000|CC1|OF THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU.       
20101221154741.000|20101221154742.000|CC1|YOU'RE ALREADY SICK.            
20101221154742.000|20101221154744.000|CC1|YOU CAN POTENTIALLY MAKE        
20101221154744.000|20101221154746.000|CC1|YOURSELF SICKER IF YOU GET ON A 
20101221154746.000|20101221154746.000|CC1|PLANE.                          
20101221154746.000|20101221154747.000|CC1|BUT REALLY IT'S THE PEOPLE      
20101221154747.000|20101221154748.000|CC1|AROUND YOU.                     
20101221154748.000|20101221154749.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY IF YOU HAVE A FEVER   
20101221154749.000|20101221154751.000|CC1|OVER 100 DEGREES, IF YOU HAVE A 
20101221154751.000|20101221154752.000|CC1|RASH, IF YOU'RE COUGHING OR     
20101221154752.000|20101221154754.000|CC1|HAVING DIFFICULTY BREATHING,    
20101221154754.000|20101221154756.000|CC1|VOMITING, DIARRHEA, YOU SHOULD  
20101221154756.000|20101221154758.000|CC1|NOT GET ON A PLANE.             
20101221154758.000|20101221154801.000|CC1|AND REMEMBER, REBECCA, IF PEOPLE
20101221154801.000|20101221154802.000|CC1|AT THE AIRLINE GATES SEE THAT   
20101221154802.000|20101221154803.000|CC1|YOU'RE VISIBLY ILL, THEY DO HAVE
20101221154803.000|20101221154805.000|CC1|THE RIGHT TO KEEP YOU OFF THE   
20101221154805.000|20101221154805.000|CC1|PLANE.                          
20101221154805.000|20101221154806.000|CC1|>> I'VE ACTUALLY SEEN THAT
